<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Azure Lily Pollen](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1742)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Kingmaker</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Inhaled" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=96" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 584</row>

**Price** 200 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Azure lilies are a rare, toxic plant. Once harvested and refined, the effects of the rare azure lily overwhelm the senses with radical swings from torpor to euphoria. **Saving Throw** DC 28 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 2d6 mental damage (1 round); **Stage 2** 3d6 mental damage (1 round); **Stage 3** 3d6 mental damage and [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) (1 round); **Stage 4** 3d6 mental damage, slowed 1, and [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5) (1 round).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Azure Lily Pollen
